price: Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mpole kwa waja wake. Humruzuku ampendaye. Naye ni Mwenye nguvu, Mtukufu.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفُۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu, ni mkuu wa kuwafanyia wema waja wake wote. Huwaruzuku awatakao kama anavyo taka. Naye ni Mwenye kushinda kila kitu, Mwenye nguvu asiye shindika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu laṭīfun biʿibādihi yarzuqu man yashāu wahuwa al-qawiyu al-ʿazīzu
